intro: This document serves as a detailed nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Coastal Zones product, focusing on land cover and land use (LC/LU) classification. It provides a comprehensive description of all Level 5 classes, including their geographic characteristics, relevant input datasets, and interpretation methods, specifically tailored for coastal environments within the EEA39 countries. The guideline aims to ensure consistency and accuracy in the mapping of coastal zones, supporting effective environmental monitoring and management.
